name: In re ADOPTIONS OF Michele Lynn SHILLITO, Stacey Lucille Shillito and Michael David Shillito. Appeal of Michael M. SHILLITO

judges: Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
O’BRIEN, C.J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: In re ADOPTIONS OF Michele Lynn SHILLITO, Stacey Lucille Shillito and Michael David Shillito. Appeal of Michael M. SHILLITO.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Each party pay own costs.
O’BRIEN, C.J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Albert G. Blakey, III, York, for appellant.
Peter D. Solymos, York, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
430 A.2d 1155
In re ADOPTIONS OF Michele Lynn SHILLITO, Stacey Lucille Shillito and Michael David Shillito. Appeal of Michael M. SHILLITO.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 21, 1981.
Decided June 4, 1981.
Albert G. Blakey, III, York, for appellant.
Peter D. Solymos, York, for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
